actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill directing the Corps of Engineers to undertake the relocation of certain water intakes of the city of Williston, N. Dak., threatened with siltation.

summary.text: Directs the Army Corps of Engineers to undertake the relocation of water intakes of the city of Williston, North Dakota, threatened with siltation. Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill directing the Corps of Engineers to undertake the relocation of certain water intakes of the city of Williston, N. Dak., threatened with siltation.
